CV Curriculum Vitae.

  • Ph.D. in Finance, University of Minnesota (09/2014 - 06/2020).

Career:

  • Assistant Professor of Finance, Darla Moore School of Business, University of South Carolina (08/2020 - ).

Research Interest:

  • Entrepreneurial Finance;
  • Innovation;
